data.title: Hardik Vachharajani PhD, MBA, CMgr, CPMgr on LinkedIn: Great to interact with incoming delegation from my home state of Gujarat…
authors: Hardik Vachharajani PhD, MBA, CMgr, CPMgr
data.meta_description:
Great to interact with incoming delegation from my home state of Gujarat visiting Sydney. 

Vibrant Gujarat 2019 promises to be a mega event as always.  Well…
data.text:
I recently had the opportunity of visiting The NorthCap University in India as part of ASIC Ltd's Inspection team led by Florence Waniwa. The experience was both insightful and enriching, underscoring the importance of maintaining rigorous standards in higher education. ASIC's inspections focus on a comprehensive evaluation of educational institutions to ensure they meet the highest standards of quality and integrity. The process includes: 🔍 Thorough Documentation Review: Meticulously examining all institutional documents, including policies, procedures, and academic programs, to ensure they align with ASIC's UK or international standards. 🏫 On-Site Visits: Conducting detailed on-site inspections to assess the facilities, resources, and overall environment provided to students and staff. 👩🏫 Interviews: Engaging with faculty, staff, and students is a crucial part of the process. These interactions help understand the institution's culture, support systems, and academic rigor. 📊 Continuous Improvement: Providing constructive feedback and recommendations aimed at fostering continuous improvement and ensuring the institution can offer an exceptional educational experience. It's always inspiring to see how dedicated institutions are providing quality education and supporting their community. Thanks Lee Hammond, Liesle Hattan and Grace Volans for the opportunity. Thanks Dr. Vaishali Sahu, Dr. Satnam Singh, Prof. (Dr.) Manoj Kumar Gopaliya, Dr Bharti Arora for hosting us. #HigherEducation #QualityAssurance #ASIC #EducationStandards #AcademicExcellence

I am happy to share that I have received the Certified Practising Manager (CPMgr) designation from Institute of Managers and Leaders Australia and New Zealand.! 🎓 The IML ANZ has re-launched this professional accreditation, specifically tailored for managers and leaders in Australia and New Zealand. This accreditation aligns with IML's code of conduct, competency framework, and professional development activities, recognizing management and leadership excellence unique to our region. As an existing Chartered Manager (CMgr) from Chartered Management Institute, I am excited to continue my journey in management and leadership with this accreditation and to contribute to the growth and development of our unique market. 🚀🇦🇺🇳🇿🦘 #Management #Leadership #CPMgr #IMLANZ #ProfessionalDevelopment #CareerGrowth #CharteredManager 🇦🇺🇳🇿 Shivani Tholasi, BCom, MBus, MIML. Samuel Bell

Great news this morning.! 🌄 🏆 SYMBIOSIS INTERNATIONAL UNIVERSITY has secured a prestigious spot in the QS World University Rankings 2025, landing in the range of 641-650 globally.! This rank places us at par with universities like Oregon State University and a notch above institutions such as the University of Houston and the The City University of New York. 🎖️ We are also incredibly proud to hold the # 1 ranking for employer reputation in India and #31 globally.! This achievement reflects the strong industry connections our university has meticulously built, ensuring our graduates are highly sought-after by top companies. 🤝 This success wouldn't be possible without the incredible efforts of our dedicated staff, talented students, and invaluable industry partners. I want to extend a special thank you to the staff working under my supervision at the Quality Management and Benchmarking (QMB) unit for their hard work and dedication. 🔭 A very special thank you and congratulations to the visionary leadership of Dr. Vidya Yeravdekar and Dr Ramakrishnan Raman for their unwavering commitment. 👩🏻💻📓✍🏻💡 This ranking is both a source of immense satisfaction and a call to even greater heights. We are deeply committed to providing the highest quality education to every student who walks through our doors. We are aware that we are a new entrant in this league and we have "miles to go before we sleep!" Dr Hardik Vachharajani Professor of Management and Director, Quality Management and Benchmarking Symbiosis International (Deemed University) #QSWUR QS Quacquarelli Symonds

It took me some time to review and analyze the recent results of the QS Quacquarelli Symonds World University Ranking by Subject for the year 2024. SYMBIOSIS INTERNATIONAL UNIVERSITY is ranked in three subject areas. In Business & Management Studies subject, the university is ranked #140 in the world. This rank puts us right above Cranfield University and Indian Institute of Management, Lucknow. It also places us right below Loughborough University, University of Technology Sydney and Waseda University. This is a massive improvement from last year when we were ranked in the 401-450 range. This result reinforces SIU’s position as a global leader in business and management education. We have entered the Social Sciences and Management league and are ranked #389 in the world. This rank puts us at par with Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur among otheres and right above universities like North Carolina State University and Stellenbosch University. This rank clearly shows that the Social Sciences and Management programs at SIU are on par with some of the best global and Indian universities. We have also entered the Computer Science and Information Systems table with a rank between 551-600 putting us at par with Western Sydney University, Abu Dhabi University and Middlesex University among others. This is a young and rapidly growing discipline at SIU. Watch out for its performance in the future.! These results are possible thanks to the visionary leadership of Dr. Vidya Yeravdekar and Dr Ramakrishnan Raman. Huge congratulations and credit goes to each and every academic and administrative staff of SIU who have put in enormous efforts. It's time to celebrate, reflect, and get back to our students and laboratories for a better outcome and impact, for ranking and beyond! Dr Hardik Vachharajani Professsor and Director, Quality Management and Benchmarking Symbiosis International (Deemed Univeresity)
